Description: At Grand Hyatt Doha, we focus on our brand promise of delivering Moments of More by offering challenging and rewarding careers that are more than just your typical job. Our values of Wellbeing, Inclusion, Respect, Empathy, Integrity, and Experimentation are the core of what we do. Our family atmosphere is what keeps our colleagues highly engaged.We are looking for an experienced IT coordinator to help us maintaining company's information technology systems and networks. Your duties will also include technical and administrative tasks to ensure functionality and efficiency of computer and telecom systems.You should have some experience in IT project management and solid technical background٫ together with good organizational٫ teambuilding and analytical abilities.Ideally with a relevant university degree or diploma in Leisure management or Hospitality/Tourism management.Minimum 2 years work experience as Information Technology Coordinator in larger operation.Good problem solving, administrative and interpersonal skills are a must.Job Details
